content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
NEUTRAL — normal volatility (Vol: 26.4%) with extremely narrow participation (Breadth: 0/8 sectors positive); market tone is cautious despite muted volatility.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Energy & Chemicals and Banking & Finance are the least weak on the week; Energy: TRMET (1W: +11.35% | 1M: +17.12%) ABOVE TREND and TRALT (1W: +8.45% | 1M: +15.82%) ABOVE TREND; Banking: YKBNK (1W: +0.43% | 1M: +10.82%) ABOVE TREND while most banks are in CORRECTION.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Transportation and Holding & Investment are the weakest; Transportation: THYAO (1W: -7.84% | 1M: +7.19%) CORRECTION and TAVHL (1W: -9.06% | 1M: +0.77%) CORRECTION; Holding: KCHOL (1W: -4.12% | 1M: +9.73%) CORRECTION and SAHOL (1W: -5.48% | 1M: +10.26%) CORRECTION.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
TRMET (1W: +11.35% | 1M: +17.12%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +8.45% | 1M: +15.82%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +3.64% | 1M: +4.33%) ABOVE TREND, EREGL (1W: +1.62% | 1M: +12.33%) ABOVE TREND, TKFEN (1W: +0.91% | 1M: +15.94%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
SASA (1W: -10.37% | 1M: +1.26%) CORRECTION, PETKM (1W: -9.24% | 1M: -2.19%) BELOW TREND, TAVHL (1W: -9.06% | 1M: +0.77%) CORRECTION, ARCLK (1W: -8.99% | 1M: +7.59%) CORRECTION, AEFES (1W: -8.58% | 1M: +13.81%) CORRECTION.

6. Momentum Stocks?
Upward momentum: TRMET (1W: +11.35% | 1M: +17.12%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: +8.45% | 1M: +15.82%) ABOVE TREND; downside momentum: SASA (1W: -10.37% | 1M: +1.26%) CORRECTION, PETKM (1W: -9.24% | 1M: -2.19%) BELOW TREND, TAVHL (1W: -9.06% | 1M: +0.77%) CORRECTION.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banking underperformed on the week but shows pockets of strength; AKBNK (1W: -0.39% | 1M: +13.56%) CORRECTION, GARAN (1W: -1.93% | 1M: +6.20%) CORRECTION, YKBNK (1W: +0.43% | 1M: +10.82%) ABOVE TREND — prefer selective bank exposure (liquidity and asset quality).

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy industry mixed with selective winners; EREGL (1W: +1.62% | 1M: +12.33%) ABOVE TREND and ASELS (1W: +3.64% | 1M: +4.33%) ABOVE TREND lead, while FROTO (1W: -5.97% | 1M: +16.75%) is in CORRECTION — watch earnings/capex signals.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Energy shows bifurcation: TRMET (1W: +11.35% | 1M: +17.12%) ABOVE TREND and TRALT (1W: +8.45% | 1M: +15.82%) ABOVE TREND are outperformers, TUPRS (1W: +0.00% | 1M: -2.25%) NEUTRAL and PETKM (1W: -9.24% | 1M: -2.19%) BELOW TREND lag — volatility tied to oil and petrochemical margins.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Maintain neutral net exposure: trim weakest cyclicals (Transportation, some HoldCos) and overweight high-conviction momentum names (TRMET, TRALT, ENKAI) and selective banks (YKBNK); keep liquidity for volatility-driven entries.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
TRMET (1W: +11.35% | 1M: +17.12%) ABOVE TREND on momentum breakouts, TRALT (1W: +8.45% | 1M: +15.82%) ABOVE TREND for follow-through, ENKAI (1W: +0.89% | 1M: +24.16%) ABOVE TREND as a quant leader, THYAO (1W: -7.84% | 1M: +7.19%) CORRECTION for recovery or further downside.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Energy & Chemicals for continuation or reversal of the recent leadership, Banking for selective spread and liquidity signals, Transportation for downside risk and earnings/capacity catalysts.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Monitor XU100 reaction to recent lows and prior resistance (watch for a clear break or hold before rotating risk on); key catalysts are CBRT commentary, FX moves, oil prices and next tranche of corporate results — adjust positions on confirmed trend breaks.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Neutral regime: normal volatility but zero sector breadth — market lacks conviction. Look to add to proven momentum winners (TRMET/TRALT/ENKAI) and selective banks, while trimming transport and holding exposures given concentrated downside risk.
